data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

A nimble, single-person outrigger star-skiff, its solar sail unfurled and hull etched with glowing tribal patterns, gracefully glides through a vibrant, swirling cosmic nebula. A lone Wayfinder, focused and determined, steers the vessel, gazing out into the vast nebula-sea with distant island-worlds shimmering on the horizon, evoking swift travel and diligent reconnaissance.

Artist Credit: inspired by John Avon

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
